short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Companion app to enable support for the Momiji protocol in browsers without native IPFS support

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Momiji Companion Chrome extension allows users to seamlessly connect to the peer-to-peer Momiji Network in the browser.

The Momiji Companion:
- Is free to use
- Doesn't require signup
- Never collects data
